SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS u0
LEFT JOIN "Posts" AS p ON u0."Email" = p."UserEmail"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON u0."Email" = c."UserEmail"
ORDER BY u0."Email", p."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-07-01 11:54:19.086 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (29ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Users" AS u

    LIMIT 2
) AS u0

LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON u0."Email" = c."UserEmail"
ORDER BY u0."Email", p."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

2025-07-01 14:49:01.104 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (29ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS u0
LEFT JOIN "Posts" AS p ON u0."Email" = p."UserEmail"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON u0."Email" = c."UserEmail"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

) AS s

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

) AS s

) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Comments" AS c

FROM "Posts" AS p

2025-07-01 20:24:58.490 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (54ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserEmail", c.iseditied, p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

2025-07-01 21:26:32.276 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (21ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"
2025-07-01 21:26:32.276 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (20ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

FROM "Users" AS u
WHERE NOT (u."IsDeleted")
2025-07-01 21:26:32.290 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (37ms) [Parameters=[@__key_0='?'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT u0."Email", u0."Bio", u0."CreatedAt", u0."IsDeleted", u0."IsSuspended", u0."Location", u0."Name", u0."PasswordHash", u0."ProfileImage", u0."Role", u0."Status", u0."SuspendedUntil", u0."SuspensionReason", u0."Website", p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserEmail", c.iseditied
FROM (
    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-07-01 21:27:58.289 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__key_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Views", s."createdAt", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt0", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    LIMIT 2
) AS s
